title: Intern Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was extremely straightforward. I had two rounds of questions, and then I received an offer to join the internship program. I felt wanted and heard.I’m so excited that I had to be a part of the company, and they gave me the opportunity to excel my career
Interview Questions: Tell us of your prior experience?

title: Missionary Support Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at TWR (Cary, NC) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied online for this position upon the recommendation of a friend.  It was a very simple initial application.  I was called by an HR lady about two days later and was scheduled for an interview in about another two days.  Although I was exceptionally qualified, I did not get the position.  I believe that there was another person who was "spotted and assessed" previously for the job who got the position.  I was to be the first of five persons to be interviewed, so it is certainly possible that others were actually more qualified than I am. I certainly don't feel like I was discriminated against because of my age.
Interview Questions: How much money are you expecting?

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at TWR
Interview Descriptions: Was referred by a friend as there was a vacancy available.  I was given an application form to complete.  I submitted the application form and my resume and was subsequently invited for an interview.
